## Chapter 2: Data Structures

### Useful Commands in Chapter
str()
typeof()

### 2.1.1 Atomic Vectors + 2.1.2 Types and tests

```{r}
dbl_var <- c(1,2.5,4.5)
typeof(dbl_var) #[1] "double"
# [1] "double"
str(dbl_var)
#  num [1:3] 1 2.5 4.5
is.double(dbl_var)
#[1] TRUE
is.atomic(dbl_var)
#[1] TRUE
is.numeric(dbl_var)
#[1] TRUE

dbl_var2<-c(1,2,3)
typeof(dbl_var2)
# [1] "double"
str(dbl_var2)
# num [1:3] 1 2 3
is.integer(dbl_var2)
#[1] FALSE

int_var<- c(1L, 2L, 3L)
typeof(int_var)
# [1] "integer"
str(int_var)
#  num [1:3] 1 2 3
is.integer(int_var)
#[1] TRUE




```
